The cave abomination is a superior variant of the cave horror. When on task, it has a chance of spawning after purchasing the unlock "Bigger and Badder" for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100%
    • 1.2 Weapons and armour
    • 1.3 Runes
    • 1.4 Herbs
    • 1.5 Seeds
    • 1.6 Coins
    • 1.7 Other
    • 1.8 Gem drop table
    • 1.9 Tertiary
    • 1.10 Superior Slayer tertiary
  • 2 Changes

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior unique table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Drop rates estimated based on 332,479 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Cave abomination kill is worth 68,095.66.
